title: 1913–14 NC State Wolfpack men's basketball team
text: The 1913–14 NC State Wolfpack men's basketball team represents <a href="North%20Carolina%20State%20University">North Carolina State University</a> during the 1913–14 <a href="National%20Collegiate%20Athletic%20Association">NCAA</a> men's basketball season. The Head coach was John Hegarty coaching the team in his first season.
